roleset.name: align again
roleset.note: REALIGN-V NOTES: No Vncls. Checked by Julia, 10/2010. (from realign.01-v)

example.name: I don't know what this means
example.text: At Chrysler's 1990 model preview last month, Chrysler Motors President Robert A. Lutz said [the No. 3 auto maker]-1, along with other U.S. manufacturers, might be forced *trace*-1 to ``realign ... capacity'' if market demand doesn't improve.

example.name: active, realign to
example.text: John realigned his bed to the earth's magnetic field.
